example: a(4)=23 because all 24 permutations of length 4, except 1324 itself, avoid pattern 1324.
maple: count1324 := proc(n::nonnegint) if (n<4) then return n!; fi; if (n=4) then return 23; fi; return nodes([5,5,5,5], n-5) + nodes([5,3,5,5], n-5) + nodes([5,4,4,5], n-5) + nodes([5,5,4,5], n-5) + nodes([4,3,4], n-5) + nodes([5,3,4,5], n-5); end:nodes := proc(p, h) option remember; local i, j, s, l; if (h=0) then return convert(p, `+`); fi; s := 0; for j to nops(p) do l := p[j]+1; for i from 2 to j do l := l, `min`(j+1, p[i]); od; for i from j+1 to p[j] do l := l, p[i-1]+1; od; s := s+nodes([l], h-1); od; return s; end:
